messages.content: Task: You are a text game player, your goal is to put things in their proper locations and improve your score. You can only perform one action at a time.

Action history: No action was taken now.
Inventory: You are carrying nothing.
Another room: Unknown
Current environment: -= Livingroom =-You arrive in a livingroom. A typical one.You see a bookcase. The bookcase contains a clean brown shirt. You make out an opened wastepaper basket close by. The wastepaper basket is empty, what a horrible day! Look over there! a sofa. The sofa is comfy. On the sofa you make out a clean gray blazer. Huh, weird. Were you looking for an armchair? Because look over there, it's an armchair. The armchair is comfortable. On the armchair you can make out a rotten red apple. You can make out a TV stand. The TV stand is ordinary. The TV stand appears to be empty. You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a grey carpet. The grey carpet is standard. The grey carpet appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well You make out a side table. But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? You see a coffee table. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You can make out an end table. The end table is wooden. On the end table you can make out a teapot.You need an exit without a door? You should try going west.

Current environment: -= Bedroom =-You've entered a bedroom.You see a wardrobe. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? You see a chest of drawers. Now why would someone leave that there? The chest of drawers contains a clean white blazer. Now why would someone leave that there? You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bed. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a nightstand. The nightstand is ordinary. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a dressing table. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? You can make out a desk chair. The desk chair is usual. But the thing is empty. Silly desk chair, silly, empty, good for nothing desk chair. You see a desk. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Hm. Oh well Hey, want to see a dark carpet? Look over there, a dark carpet. The dark carpet appears to be empty.You need an exit without a door? You should try going east.There is a fleece jacket and a blue tie on the floor.
